text: CDC - Preventing Chronic Disease: Public Health Research, Practice and PolicyHey Twitterati! 👋 I'm excited to share this Call for Papers from the CDC! 🧑‍💻 They're looking for manuscripts on public health research, practice, and policy to prevent chronic diseases. 💡Submit your work anytime, but note the final submission dates for each collection. 📝 Accepted manuscripts will be published on a rolling basis, so don't wait! 🔄Let's work together to advance the field of public health and improve the lives of millions. 🌎 Share your research and expertise with the CDC! 💬
